--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/9c93c44b36f75392a167ab00ffaed6e01915995981.png> 	

This Eid, we celebrate the harmony that unites us, rooted in compassion, generosity, and shared purpose; every act of giving and every moment of kindness brings us closer together.

Wishing our people, partners, and communities a blessed Eid filled with joy, prosperity, and peace for a brighter future.

Adha Mubarak from us to yours!
في هذا العيد، نحتفل بالتناغم الذي يوحّدنا، والمتجذر في التعاطف والكرم والهدف المشترك؛ كل فعل عطاء وكل لفتة لطف تقرّبنا من بعضنا البعض

نتمنى لأفرادنا وشركائنا ومجتمعاتنا عيدًا مليئًا بالفرح والازدهار والسلام لمستقبل أكثر إشراقًا

عيد أضحى مبارك. كل عام وأنتم بخير

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Step Into Emirati Culture

Step Into Emirati Culture

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1207&user=10620> 	

Curious about the meaning behind Emirati greetings, customs, or national holidays?

The Emirati Way: Culture & Connection is your gateway to understanding the traditions, values, and stories that shape life in the UAE.

Whether you're new to the country or have been here for years, this course offers valuable insights that help you connect more meaningfully.

Explore the course now! <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1207&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-7-min.png> 	

Transform Tuesday

From forecasting to allocation, planning is evolving — moving away from manual guesswork toward precision, speed, and smarter decisions.
Across three phases, we’re laying the foundation for AI-led planning that helps the right products land in the right place, at the right time.

Join the conversation here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1208&user=10620> .

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/024e9f4663aaf6e458270a634260255a924294090.png>

HSSE Alert: Fire Safety

As summer temperatures continue to rise across the region, it's critical that we stay vigilant about fire safety in our office environments.​

Office spaces often include high usage of electrical equipment, storage of documents, and enclosed areas—all of which can increase the risk of fire, especially when combined with the intense heat we experience during the summer months. Click here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1210&user=10620>  to learn more.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/694ef5181163d21d9bcb23f2242dc4211682311869.gif>
